ids_info.name: magnetics
ids_info.description: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control.

magnetics/flux_loop.documentation: Flux loops; partial flux loops can be described. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control.

magnetics/flux_loop/name.documentation: Short string identifier (unique for a given device). Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within flux_loop container: Flux loops; partial flux loops can be described.

magnetics/flux_loop/description.documentation: Description, e.g. “channel viewing the upper divertor”. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within flux_loop container: Flux loops; partial flux loops can be described.

magnetics/flux_loop/type.documentation: Flux loop type. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within flux_loop container: Flux loops; partial flux loops can be described.

magnetics/flux_loop/type/name.documentation: Short string identifier. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within flux_loop container: Flux loops; partial flux loops can be described. Within type container: Flux loop type.

magnetics/flux_loop/type/index.documentation: Integer identifier (enumeration index within a list). Private identifier values must be indicated by a negative index. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within flux_loop container: Flux loops; partial flux loops can be described. Within type container: Flux loop type.

magnetics/flux_loop/type/description.documentation: Verbose description. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within flux_loop container: Flux loops; partial flux loops can be described. Within type container: Flux loop type.

magnetics/flux_loop/position.documentation: List of (R,Z,phi) points defining the position of the loop (see data structure documentation FLUXLOOPposition.pdf). Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within flux_loop container: Flux loops; partial flux loops can be described.

magnetics/flux_loop/position/r.documentation: Major radius. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within flux_loop container: Flux loops; partial flux loops can be described. Within position container: List of (R,Z,phi) points defining the position of the loop (see data structure documentation FLUXLOOPposition.pdf).

magnetics/flux_loop/position/phi.documentation: Toroidal angle (oriented counter-clockwise when viewing from above). Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within flux_loop container: Flux loops; partial flux loops can be described. Within position container: List of (R,Z,phi) points defining the position of the loop (see data structure documentation FLUXLOOPposition.pdf).

magnetics/flux_loop/position/z.documentation: Height. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within flux_loop container: Flux loops; partial flux loops can be described. Within position container: List of (R,Z,phi) points defining the position of the loop (see data structure documentation FLUXLOOPposition.pdf).

magnetics/flux_loop/indices_differential.documentation: Indices (from the flux_loop array of structure) of the two flux loops used to build the flux difference flux(second index) - flux(first index). Use only if ../type/index = 6, leave empty otherwise. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within flux_loop container: Flux loops; partial flux loops can be described.

magnetics/flux_loop/area.documentation: Effective area (ratio between flux and average magnetic field over the loop). Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within flux_loop container: Flux loops; partial flux loops can be described.

magnetics/flux_loop/gm9.documentation: Integral of 1/R over the loop area (ratio between flux and magnetic rigidity R0.B0). Use only if ../type/index = 3 to 6, leave empty otherwise. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within flux_loop container: Flux loops; partial flux loops can be described.

magnetics/flux_loop/flux.documentation: Measured magnetic flux through loop with normal to enclosed surface determined by order of points. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within flux_loop container: Flux loops; partial flux loops can be described.

magnetics/flux_loop/flux/data.documentation: Data. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within flux_loop container: Flux loops; partial flux loops can be described. Within flux container: Measured magnetic flux through loop with normal to enclosed surface determined by order of points.

magnetics/flux_loop/flux/validity_timed.documentation: Indicator of the validity of the data for each time slice. 0: valid from automated processing, 1: valid and certified by the diagnostic RO; - 1 means problem identified in the data processing (request verification by the diagnostic RO), -2: invalid data, should not be used (values lower than -2 have a code-specific meaning detailing the origin of their invalidity). Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within flux_loop container: Flux loops; partial flux loops can be described. Within flux container: Measured magnetic flux through loop with normal to enclosed surface determined by order of points.

magnetics/flux_loop/flux/validity.documentation: Indicator of the validity of the data for the whole acquisition period. 0: valid from automated processing, 1: valid and certified by the diagnostic RO; - 1 means problem identified in the data processing (request verification by the diagnostic RO), -2: invalid data, should not be used (values lower than -2 have a code-specific meaning detailing the origin of their invalidity). Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within flux_loop container: Flux loops; partial flux loops can be described. Within flux container: Measured magnetic flux through loop with normal to enclosed surface determined by order of points.

magnetics/flux_loop/flux/time.documentation: Time. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within flux_loop container: Flux loops; partial flux loops can be described. Within flux container: Measured magnetic flux through loop with normal to enclosed surface determined by order of points.

magnetics/flux_loop/voltage.documentation: Measured voltage between the loop terminals. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within flux_loop container: Flux loops; partial flux loops can be described.

magnetics/flux_loop/voltage/data.documentation: Data. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within flux_loop container: Flux loops; partial flux loops can be described. Within voltage container: Measured voltage between the loop terminals.

magnetics/flux_loop/voltage/validity_tim.documentation: Indicator of the validity of the data for each time slice. 0: valid from automated processing, 1: valid and certified by the diagnostic RO; - 1 means problem identified in the data processing (request verification by the diagnostic RO), -2: invalid data, should not be used (values lower than -2 have a code-specific meaning detailing the origin of their invalidity). Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within flux_loop container: Flux loops; partial flux loops can be described. Within voltage container: Measured voltage between the loop terminals.

magnetics/flux_loop/voltage/validity.documentation: Indicator of the validity of the data for the whole acquisition period. 0: valid from automated processing, 1: valid and certified by the diagnostic RO; - 1 means problem identified in the data processing (request verification by the diagnostic RO), -2: invalid data, should not be used (values lower than -2 have a code-specific meaning detailing the origin of their invalidity). Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within flux_loop container: Flux loops; partial flux loops can be described. Within voltage container: Measured voltage between the loop terminals.

magnetics/flux_loop/voltage/time.documentation: Time. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within flux_loop container: Flux loops; partial flux loops can be described. Within voltage container: Measured voltage between the loop terminals.

magnetics/b_field_pol_probe.documentation: Poloidal field probes. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control.

magnetics/b_field_pol_probe/name.documentation: Short string identifier (unique for a given device). Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within b_field_pol_probe container: Poloidal field probes.

magnetics/b_field_pol_probe/description.documentation: Description, e.g. “channel viewing the upper divertor”. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within b_field_pol_probe container: Poloidal field probes.

magnetics/b_field_pol_probe/type.documentation: Probe type. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within b_field_pol_probe container: Poloidal field probes.

magnetics/b_field_pol_probe/type/name.documentation: Short string identifier. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within b_field_pol_probe container: Poloidal field probes. Within type container: Probe type.

magnetics/b_field_pol_probe/type/index.documentation: Integer identifier (enumeration index within a list). Private identifier values must be indicated by a negative index. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within b_field_pol_probe container: Poloidal field probes. Within type container: Probe type.

magnetics/b_field_pol_probe/type/descrip.documentation: Verbose description. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within b_field_pol_probe container: Poloidal field probes. Within type container: Probe type.

magnetics/b_field_pol_probe/position.documentation: R, Z, Phi position of the coil centre. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within b_field_pol_probe container: Poloidal field probes.

magnetics/b_field_pol_probe/position/r.documentation: Major radius. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within b_field_pol_probe container: Poloidal field probes. Within position container: R, Z, Phi position of the coil centre.

magnetics/b_field_pol_probe/position/phi.documentation: Toroidal angle (oriented counter-clockwise when viewing from above). Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within b_field_pol_probe container: Poloidal field probes. Within position container: R, Z, Phi position of the coil centre.

magnetics/b_field_pol_probe/position/z.documentation: Height. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within b_field_pol_probe container: Poloidal field probes. Within position container: R, Z, Phi position of the coil centre.

magnetics/b_field_pol_probe/poloidal_ang.documentation: Angle of the sensor normal vector (vector parallel to the the axis of the coil, n on the diagram) with respect to horizontal plane (clockwise theta-like angle). Zero if sensor normal vector fully in the horizontal plane and oriented towards increasing major radius. Values in [0 , 2Pi]. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within b_field_pol_probe container: Poloidal field probes.

magnetics/b_field_pol_probe/toroidal_ang.documentation: Angle of the projection of the sensor normal vector (n) in the horizontal plane with the increasing R direction (i.e. grad(R)) (angle is counter-clockwise from above). Values should be taken modulo pi with values within (-pi/2,pi/2]. Zero if projected sensor normal is parallel to grad(R), pi/2 if it is parallel to grad(phi). Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within b_field_pol_probe container: Poloidal field probes.

magnetics/b_field_pol_probe/indices_diff.documentation: Indices (from the b_field_pol_probe array of structure) of the two probes used to build the field difference field(second index) - field(first index). Use only if ../type/index = 6, leave empty otherwise. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within b_field_pol_probe container: Poloidal field probes.

magnetics/b_field_pol_probe/bandwidth_3d.documentation: 3dB bandwith (first index : lower frequency bound, second index : upper frequency bound). Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within b_field_pol_probe container: Poloidal field probes.

magnetics/b_field_pol_probe/area.documentation: Area of each turn of the sensor; becomes effective area when multiplied by the turns. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within b_field_pol_probe container: Poloidal field probes.

magnetics/b_field_pol_probe/length.documentation: Length of the sensor along it's normal vector (n). Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within b_field_pol_probe container: Poloidal field probes.

magnetics/b_field_pol_probe/turns.documentation: Turns in the coil, including sign. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within b_field_pol_probe container: Poloidal field probes.

magnetics/b_field_pol_probe/field.documentation: Magnetic field component in direction of sensor normal axis (n) averaged over sensor volume defined by area and length, where n = cos(poloidal_angle)*cos(toroidal_angle)*grad(R) - sin(poloidal_angle)*grad(Z) + cos(poloidal_angle)*sin(toroidal_angle)*grad(Phi)/norm(grad(Phi)). Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within b_field_pol_probe container: Poloidal field probes.

magnetics/b_field_pol_probe/field/data.documentation: Data. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within b_field_pol_probe container: Poloidal field probes. Within field container: Magnetic field component in direction of sensor normal axis (n) averaged over sensor volume defined by area and length, where n = cos(poloidal_angle)*cos(toroidal_angle)*grad(R) - sin(poloidal_angle)*grad(Z) + cos(poloidal_angle)*sin(toroidal_angle)*grad(Phi)/norm(grad(Phi)).

magnetics/b_field_pol_probe/field/validi.documentation: Indicator of the validity of the data for each time slice. 0: valid from automated processing, 1: valid and certified by the diagnostic RO; - 1 means problem identified in the data processing (request verification by the diagnostic RO), -2: invalid data, should not be used (values lower than -2 have a code-specific meaning detailing the origin of their invalidity). Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within b_field_pol_probe container: Poloidal field probes. Within field container: Magnetic field component in direction of sensor normal axis (n) averaged over sensor volume defined by area and length, where n = cos(poloidal_angle)*cos(toroidal_angle)*grad(R) - sin(poloidal_angle)*grad(Z) + cos(poloidal_angle)*sin(toroidal_angle)*grad(Phi)/norm(grad(Phi)).

Indicator of the validity of the data for the whole acquisition period. 0: valid from automated processing, 1: valid and certified by the diagnostic RO; - 1 means problem identified in the data processing (request verification by the diagnostic RO), -2: invalid data, should not be used (values lower than -2 have a code-specific meaning detailing the origin of their invalidity). Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within b_field_pol_probe container: Poloidal field probes. Within field container: Magnetic field component in direction of sensor normal axis (n) averaged over sensor volume defined by area and length, where n = cos(poloidal_angle)*cos(toroidal_angle)*grad(R) - sin(poloidal_angle)*grad(Z) + cos(poloidal_angle)*sin(toroidal_angle)*grad(Phi)/norm(grad(Phi)).

magnetics/b_field_pol_probe/field/time.documentation: Time. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within b_field_pol_probe container: Poloidal field probes. Within field container: Magnetic field component in direction of sensor normal axis (n) averaged over sensor volume defined by area and length, where n = cos(poloidal_angle)*cos(toroidal_angle)*grad(R) - sin(poloidal_angle)*grad(Z) + cos(poloidal_angle)*sin(toroidal_angle)*grad(Phi)/norm(grad(Phi)).

magnetics/b_field_pol_probe/voltage.documentation: Voltage on the coil terminals. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within b_field_pol_probe container: Poloidal field probes.

magnetics/b_field_pol_probe/voltage/data.documentation: Data. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within b_field_pol_probe container: Poloidal field probes. Within voltage container: Voltage on the coil terminals.

magnetics/b_field_pol_probe/voltage/vali.documentation: Indicator of the validity of the data for each time slice. 0: valid from automated processing, 1: valid and certified by the diagnostic RO; - 1 means problem identified in the data processing (request verification by the diagnostic RO), -2: invalid data, should not be used (values lower than -2 have a code-specific meaning detailing the origin of their invalidity). Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within b_field_pol_probe container: Poloidal field probes. Within voltage container: Voltage on the coil terminals.

Indicator of the validity of the data for the whole acquisition period. 0: valid from automated processing, 1: valid and certified by the diagnostic RO; - 1 means problem identified in the data processing (request verification by the diagnostic RO), -2: invalid data, should not be used (values lower than -2 have a code-specific meaning detailing the origin of their invalidity). Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within b_field_pol_probe container: Poloidal field probes. Within voltage container: Voltage on the coil terminals.

magnetics/b_field_pol_probe/voltage/time.documentation: Time. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within b_field_pol_probe container: Poloidal field probes. Within voltage container: Voltage on the coil terminals.

magnetics/b_field_pol_probe/non_linear_r.documentation: Non-linear response of the probe (typically in case of a Hall probe). Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within b_field_pol_probe container: Poloidal field probes.

Array of magnetic field values (corresponding to the assumption of a linear relation between magnetic field and probe coil current), for each of which the probe non-linear response is given in ../b_field_non_linear. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within b_field_pol_probe container: Poloidal field probes. Within non_linear_response container: Non-linear response of the probe (typically in case of a Hall probe).

Magnetic field value taking into account the non-linear response of the probe. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within b_field_pol_probe container: Poloidal field probes. Within non_linear_response container: Non-linear response of the probe (typically in case of a Hall probe).

magnetics/b_field_pol_probe_equivalent.documentation: Indices of equivalent poloidal field probes (from the b_field_pol_probe array) that differ only by their toroidal position and have the same (R,Z) position and the same coil orientation (poloidal and toroidal angles). Sets of equivalent probes (i.e. sets of (R, Z, poloidal_angle and toroidal_angle) values) are grouped by the first coordinate and the coils belonging to a given set are listed along the second coordinate. As an example, if there are N probes in a poloidal cross section that are replicated at the same poloidal positions and with the same orientation at 8 toroidal positions, the matrix will be of size Nx8. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control.

magnetics/b_field_phi_probe.documentation: Toroidal field probes. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control.

magnetics/rogowski_coil.documentation: Set of Rogowski coils. If some of the coils form a compound Rogowski sensor, they must be entered in contiguous order. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control.

magnetics/rogowski_coil/name.documentation: Short string identifier (unique for a given device). Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within rogowski_coil container: Set of Rogowski coils. If some of the coils form a compound Rogowski sensor, they must be entered in contiguous order.

magnetics/rogowski_coil/description.documentation: Description, e.g. “channel viewing the upper divertor”. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within rogowski_coil container: Set of Rogowski coils. If some of the coils form a compound Rogowski sensor, they must be entered in contiguous order.

magnetics/rogowski_coil/measured_quantit.documentation: Quantity measured by the sensor. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within rogowski_coil container: Set of Rogowski coils. If some of the coils form a compound Rogowski sensor, they must be entered in contiguous order.

options.name: compound
options.description: Sensor composed of multiple partial Rogowskis

magnetics/rogowski_coil/measured_quantit.documentation: Short string identifier. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within rogowski_coil container: Set of Rogowski coils. If some of the coils form a compound Rogowski sensor, they must be entered in contiguous order. Within measured_quantity container: Quantity measured by the sensor.

Integer identifier (enumeration index within a list). Private identifier values must be indicated by a negative index. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within rogowski_coil container: Set of Rogowski coils. If some of the coils form a compound Rogowski sensor, they must be entered in contiguous order. Within measured_quantity container: Quantity measured by the sensor.

Verbose description. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within rogowski_coil container: Set of Rogowski coils. If some of the coils form a compound Rogowski sensor, they must be entered in contiguous order. Within measured_quantity container: Quantity measured by the sensor.

magnetics/rogowski_coil/position.documentation: List of (R,Z,phi) points defining the position of the coil guiding centre. Values defining a single segment must be entered in contiguous order. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within rogowski_coil container: Set of Rogowski coils. If some of the coils form a compound Rogowski sensor, they must be entered in contiguous order.

magnetics/rogowski_coil/position/r.documentation: Major radius. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within rogowski_coil container: Set of Rogowski coils. If some of the coils form a compound Rogowski sensor, they must be entered in contiguous order. Within position container: List of (R,Z,phi) points defining the position of the coil guiding centre. Values defining a single segment must be entered in contiguous order.

magnetics/rogowski_coil/position/phi.documentation: Toroidal angle (oriented counter-clockwise when viewing from above). Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within rogowski_coil container: Set of Rogowski coils. If some of the coils form a compound Rogowski sensor, they must be entered in contiguous order. Within position container: List of (R,Z,phi) points defining the position of the coil guiding centre. Values defining a single segment must be entered in contiguous order.

magnetics/rogowski_coil/position/z.documentation: Height. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within rogowski_coil container: Set of Rogowski coils. If some of the coils form a compound Rogowski sensor, they must be entered in contiguous order. Within position container: List of (R,Z,phi) points defining the position of the coil guiding centre. Values defining a single segment must be entered in contiguous order.

magnetics/rogowski_coil/indices_compound.documentation: Indices (from the rogowski_coil array of structure) of the partial Rogowskis used to build the coumpound signal (sum of the partial Rogowski signals). Can be set to any unique integer value for each section of a compound Rogowski coil. Use only if ../measure_quantity/index = 5, leave empty otherwise. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within rogowski_coil container: Set of Rogowski coils. If some of the coils form a compound Rogowski sensor, they must be entered in contiguous order.

magnetics/rogowski_coil/area.documentation: Effective area of the loop wrapped around the guiding centre. In case of multiple layers, sum of the areas of each layer. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within rogowski_coil container: Set of Rogowski coils. If some of the coils form a compound Rogowski sensor, they must be entered in contiguous order.

magnetics/rogowski_coil/turns_per_metre.documentation: Number of turns per unit length. In case of multiple layers, turns are counted for a single layer. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within rogowski_coil container: Set of Rogowski coils. If some of the coils form a compound Rogowski sensor, they must be entered in contiguous order.

magnetics/rogowski_coil/current.documentation: Measured current inside the Rogowski coil contour. The normal direction to the Rogowski coil is defined by the order of points in the list of guiding centre positions. The current is positive when oriented in the same direction as the normal. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within rogowski_coil container: Set of Rogowski coils. If some of the coils form a compound Rogowski sensor, they must be entered in contiguous order.

magnetics/rogowski_coil/current/data.documentation: Data. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within rogowski_coil container: Set of Rogowski coils. If some of the coils form a compound Rogowski sensor, they must be entered in contiguous order. Within current container: Measured current inside the Rogowski coil contour. The normal direction to the Rogowski coil is defined by the order of points in the list of guiding centre positions. The current is positive when oriented in the same direction as the normal.

magnetics/rogowski_coil/current/validity.documentation: Indicator of the validity of the data for each time slice. 0: valid from automated processing, 1: valid and certified by the diagnostic RO; - 1 means problem identified in the data processing (request verification by the diagnostic RO), -2: invalid data, should not be used (values lower than -2 have a code-specific meaning detailing the origin of their invalidity). Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within rogowski_coil container: Set of Rogowski coils. If some of the coils form a compound Rogowski sensor, they must be entered in contiguous order. Within current container: Measured current inside the Rogowski coil contour. The normal direction to the Rogowski coil is defined by the order of points in the list of guiding centre positions. The current is positive when oriented in the same direction as the normal.

Indicator of the validity of the data for the whole acquisition period. 0: valid from automated processing, 1: valid and certified by the diagnostic RO; - 1 means problem identified in the data processing (request verification by the diagnostic RO), -2: invalid data, should not be used (values lower than -2 have a code-specific meaning detailing the origin of their invalidity). Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within rogowski_coil container: Set of Rogowski coils. If some of the coils form a compound Rogowski sensor, they must be entered in contiguous order. Within current container: Measured current inside the Rogowski coil contour. The normal direction to the Rogowski coil is defined by the order of points in the list of guiding centre positions. The current is positive when oriented in the same direction as the normal.

magnetics/rogowski_coil/current/time.documentation: Time. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within rogowski_coil container: Set of Rogowski coils. If some of the coils form a compound Rogowski sensor, they must be entered in contiguous order. Within current container: Measured current inside the Rogowski coil contour. The normal direction to the Rogowski coil is defined by the order of points in the list of guiding centre positions. The current is positive when oriented in the same direction as the normal.

magnetics/shunt.documentation: Set of shunt resistances through which currents in the divertor structure are measured. Shunts are modelled as piecewise straight line segments in the poloidal plane. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control.

magnetics/shunt/name.documentation: Short string identifier (unique for a given device). Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within shunt container: Set of shunt resistances through which currents in the divertor structure are measured. Shunts are modelled as piecewise straight line segments in the poloidal plane.

magnetics/shunt/description.documentation: Description, e.g. “channel viewing the upper divertor”. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within shunt container: Set of shunt resistances through which currents in the divertor structure are measured. Shunts are modelled as piecewise straight line segments in the poloidal plane.

magnetics/shunt/position.documentation: Position of shunt terminals. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within shunt container: Set of shunt resistances through which currents in the divertor structure are measured. Shunts are modelled as piecewise straight line segments in the poloidal plane.

magnetics/shunt/position/first_point.documentation: Position of the first point. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within shunt container: Set of shunt resistances through which currents in the divertor structure are measured. Shunts are modelled as piecewise straight line segments in the poloidal plane. Within position container: Position of shunt terminals.

magnetics/shunt/position/first_point/r.documentation: Major radius. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within shunt container: Set of shunt resistances through which currents in the divertor structure are measured. Shunts are modelled as piecewise straight line segments in the poloidal plane. Within position container: Position of shunt terminals. Within first_point container: Position of the first point.

magnetics/shunt/position/first_point/z.documentation: Height. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within shunt container: Set of shunt resistances through which currents in the divertor structure are measured. Shunts are modelled as piecewise straight line segments in the poloidal plane. Within position container: Position of shunt terminals. Within first_point container: Position of the first point.

magnetics/shunt/position/second_point.documentation: Position of the second point. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within shunt container: Set of shunt resistances through which currents in the divertor structure are measured. Shunts are modelled as piecewise straight line segments in the poloidal plane. Within position container: Position of shunt terminals.

magnetics/shunt/position/second_point/r.documentation: Major radius. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within shunt container: Set of shunt resistances through which currents in the divertor structure are measured. Shunts are modelled as piecewise straight line segments in the poloidal plane. Within position container: Position of shunt terminals. Within second_point container: Position of the second point.

magnetics/shunt/position/second_point/z.documentation: Height. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within shunt container: Set of shunt resistances through which currents in the divertor structure are measured. Shunts are modelled as piecewise straight line segments in the poloidal plane. Within position container: Position of shunt terminals. Within second_point container: Position of the second point.

magnetics/shunt/resistance.documentation: Shunt resistance. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within shunt container: Set of shunt resistances through which currents in the divertor structure are measured. Shunts are modelled as piecewise straight line segments in the poloidal plane.

magnetics/shunt/voltage.documentation: Voltage on the shunt terminals (Vfirst_point-Vsecond_point). Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within shunt container: Set of shunt resistances through which currents in the divertor structure are measured. Shunts are modelled as piecewise straight line segments in the poloidal plane.

magnetics/shunt/voltage/data.documentation: Data. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within shunt container: Set of shunt resistances through which currents in the divertor structure are measured. Shunts are modelled as piecewise straight line segments in the poloidal plane. Within voltage container: Voltage on the shunt terminals (Vfirst_point-Vsecond_point).

magnetics/shunt/voltage/validity_timed.documentation: Indicator of the validity of the data for each time slice. 0: valid from automated processing, 1: valid and certified by the diagnostic RO; - 1 means problem identified in the data processing (request verification by the diagnostic RO), -2: invalid data, should not be used (values lower than -2 have a code-specific meaning detailing the origin of their invalidity). Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within shunt container: Set of shunt resistances through which currents in the divertor structure are measured. Shunts are modelled as piecewise straight line segments in the poloidal plane. Within voltage container: Voltage on the shunt terminals (Vfirst_point-Vsecond_point).

magnetics/shunt/voltage/validity.documentation: Indicator of the validity of the data for the whole acquisition period. 0: valid from automated processing, 1: valid and certified by the diagnostic RO; - 1 means problem identified in the data processing (request verification by the diagnostic RO), -2: invalid data, should not be used (values lower than -2 have a code-specific meaning detailing the origin of their invalidity). Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within shunt container: Set of shunt resistances through which currents in the divertor structure are measured. Shunts are modelled as piecewise straight line segments in the poloidal plane. Within voltage container: Voltage on the shunt terminals (Vfirst_point-Vsecond_point).

magnetics/shunt/voltage/time.documentation: Time. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within shunt container: Set of shunt resistances through which currents in the divertor structure are measured. Shunts are modelled as piecewise straight line segments in the poloidal plane. Within voltage container: Voltage on the shunt terminals (Vfirst_point-Vsecond_point).

magnetics/shunt/divertor_index.documentation: If the shunt is located on a given divertor, index of that divertor in the divertors IDS. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within shunt container: Set of shunt resistances through which currents in the divertor structure are measured. Shunts are modelled as piecewise straight line segments in the poloidal plane.

magnetics/shunt/target_index.documentation: If the shunt is located on a divertor target, index of that target in the divertors IDS. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within shunt container: Set of shunt resistances through which currents in the divertor structure are measured. Shunts are modelled as piecewise straight line segments in the poloidal plane.

magnetics/shunt/tile_index.documentation: If the shunt is located on a divertor tile, index of that tile in the divertors IDS. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within shunt container: Set of shunt resistances through which currents in the divertor structure are measured. Shunts are modelled as piecewise straight line segments in the poloidal plane.

magnetics/ip.documentation: Plasma current. Positive sign means anti-clockwise when viewed from above. The array of structure corresponds to a set of calculation methods (starting with the generally recommended method). Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control.

magnetics/ip/method_name.documentation: Name of the calculation method. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within ip container: Plasma current. Positive sign means anti-clockwise when viewed from above. The array of structure corresponds to a set of calculation methods (starting with the generally recommended method).

magnetics/ip/data.documentation: Data. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within ip container: Plasma current. Positive sign means anti-clockwise when viewed from above. The array of structure corresponds to a set of calculation methods (starting with the generally recommended method).

magnetics/ip/time.documentation: Time. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within ip container: Plasma current. Positive sign means anti-clockwise when viewed from above. The array of structure corresponds to a set of calculation methods (starting with the generally recommended method).

magnetics/diamagnetic_flux.documentation: Diamagnetic flux. The array of structure corresponds to a set of calculation methods (starting with the generally recommended method). Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control.

magnetics/diamagnetic_flux/method_name.documentation: Name of the calculation method. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within diamagnetic_flux container: Diamagnetic flux. The array of structure corresponds to a set of calculation methods (starting with the generally recommended method).

magnetics/diamagnetic_flux/data.documentation: Data. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within diamagnetic_flux container: Diamagnetic flux. The array of structure corresponds to a set of calculation methods (starting with the generally recommended method).

magnetics/diamagnetic_flux/time.documentation: Time. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control. Within diamagnetic_flux container: Diamagnetic flux. The array of structure corresponds to a set of calculation methods (starting with the generally recommended method).

magnetics/latency.documentation: Upper bound of the delay between physical information received by the detector and data available on the real-time (RT) network. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control.

magnetics/time.documentation: Generic time. Within magnetics IDS: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control.
